title: Chapter 8B - Signs And Markings
content:
Chapter 8B - Signs And Markings

State Regulations
§ 8B.04 - Crossbuck Assemblies with YIELD or STOP Signs at Passive Grade Crossings
§ 8B.05 - Use of STOP (R1-1) or YIELD (R1-2) Signs without Crossbuck Signs at Highway-LRT Grade Crossings
§ 8B.06 - Grade Crossing Advance Warning Signs (W10 Series)
§ 8B.07 - EXEMPT Grade Crossing Plaques (R15-3P, W10-1aP)
§ 8B.09 - DO NOT STOP ON TRACKS Sign (R8-8)
§ 8B.10 - TRACKS OUT OF SERVICE Sign (R8-9)
§ 8B.11 - STOP HERE WHEN FLASHING Sign (R8-10, R8-10a)
§ 8B.12 - STOP HERE ON RED Sign (R10-6, R10-6a)
§ 8B.14 - Do Not Pass Light Rail Transit Signs (R15-5, R15-5a)
§ 8B.15 - No Motor Vehicles On Tracks Signs (R15-6, R15-6a)
§ 8B.18 - Emergency Notification Sign (I-13)
§ 8B.20 - TRAINS MAY EXCEED 80 MPH Sign (W10-8)
§ 8B.101 - NOTICE INCREASED TRAIN TRAFFIC Sign (NYR10-5)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
